import React, { Component } from 'react'; const Timeline = (props) => { const data = props.portfolioData; let expList; expList = data.education.map((exp, i) => (
{ exp.date }
{ exp.title }

{ exp.institute }

{ exp. description }
)) let workList; workList = data.work.map((work, i) => (
{ work.date }
{ work.title }

{ work.company }

{ work. description }
)) return(

Education

{ expList }

Work

{ workList }
) } export default Timeline ;
